info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sepia.defense.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 157 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 31 Jul 2022 11:16:37 GMT Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin Server: nginx X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx/1.17.7
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: sepia.defense.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://sepia.defense.gouv.fr/'
